text: William P. Kenoi (November 1968 â€“ January 26, 2021) was an American Democratic politician. Kenoi was Mayor of Hawaii County from 2008 to 2016. He was a legislative aide in the State House and State Senate. He was born in Kalapana, Hawaii. In 2015, Kenoi was diagnosed with myelofibrosis.Former Big Island mayor Billy Kenoi battling life-threatening cancer He died from the disease on January 26, 2021 in Honolulu at the age of 52.Billy Kenoi, former Hawaii County mayor, has died after lengthy battle with cancer ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Mayoral website Category:1968 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Hawaii Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from myelofibrosis Category:Cancer deaths in Hawaii
title: Billy Kenoi
